TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner

summary.span: 擴充 Web 伺服器控制項的設計階段行為。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. 程式碼會覆寫方法，以自訂， ，和屬性時設計介面上呈現控制項。The code overrides the method to customize the , , and properties when the control is rendered on a design surface. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用使設計工具屬性控制項。The following example shows how to use the attribute to associate the designer with the control. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#5)]

param.span: 可用於建立樣板 (Template) 編輯框架 (Frame)。

span.span: The for which to create the template editing frame.

summary.span: 使用指定的動作 (Verb) 以建立樣板編輯框架。

A template editing frame.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: ，表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，，則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; to release only the unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`disposing`參數是`true`、方法 managed 物件所持有的所有資源釋都出這個物件參考。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, the method releases all the resources held by the managed objects that this object references.

para.span: 方法可以由其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: The method can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫它，請務必不會參考物件已處置之前呼叫。

span.span: When overriding it, be sure that you do not reference objects that have been disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需如何實作這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement this method, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和方法，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about the and methods, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: public override string GetDesignTimeHtml ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String
public: override System::String ^ GetDesignTimeHtml();

summary.span: 取得用來在設計階段表示 控制項的 HTML 標記。

span.span: Gets the HTML markup used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 用來在設計階段表示 控制項的 HTML 標記。

span.span: The HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以改變的外觀設計介面上的控制項。The following code example shows how to override the method to alter the appearance of the control on the design surface. 程式碼會使用`Try...Catch...Finally`語法來執行下列動作：The code uses `Try...Catch...Finally` syntax to do the following: - `Try`區段會變更的資料格控制項屬性的值。The `Try` section changes the values of the properties of the data grid control. - `Catch`區段攔截任何例外狀況，並傳送至方法。The `Catch` section catches any exceptions and sends them to the method. - `Finally` > 一節將屬性設定為其原始值。The `Finally` section sets the properties to their original values. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#2)]

span.span: The HTML markup used to represent an empty template-based control at design time.

span.span: The exception that occurred.

summary.span: 取得當呈現控制項發生錯誤時，指定的例外狀況在設計階段所顯示的 HTML 標記。

span.span: Gets the HTML markup displayed at design time for the specified exception when an error has been encountered while rendering the control.

returns.span: 指定的例外狀況在設計階段所顯示的 HTML 標記。

span.span: The HTML markup displayed at design time for the specified exception.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，以修改的外觀例外狀況發生時，在設計介面上的控制項。The following code example shows how to override the method to modify the appearance of the control on the design surface when an exception occurs. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#3)]
